meta.description: Qatar Airways Al Safwa First Class Lounge at Hamad International Airport (DOH), Terminal 1. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Qatar Airways Al Safwa First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: From the Duty Free South Area, go up the escalators located to the right of the Giant Teddy Bear near IN-Q Cafe and Cedar Room Cigars.

lounge.description: Start your luxurious Qatar Airways First Class experience in one of the world's most extravagant and exclusive oases. In this one-of-a-kind lounge, you'll discover five star dining, private day suites, private duty-free shopping, a floor-to-ceiling water fountain, and much more. Enjoy the full royal treatment in one of the best airport lounges in the world.

reviews.content: Like stopping at the Four Seasons between flights. Gorgeous. Silent. 10% occupied at the busiest time of the day for this airport. As good as it gets.

The best lounge I've been to. Private sleeping rooms w/ shower for 4 hr max. Fantastic made-to-order meals. Serves Veuve Grande Dame. Only downside - cavernous to a fault. Felt like I was in a museum.
This might be the best lounge you will ever visit, so spacious with lots of secluded seats.

One of the best first class lounges due to the restrictions only for first class passengers. Nicely isolated each area. Only complaint is the breakfast menu is not updated and is the same as in the A380.
There can be no doubt this is an amazing lounge, enormous, visually stunning. However, it is not comfortable, more like being in a church. High points are sleeping rooms and staff. Food not amazing.
Absolutely gigantic and usually pretty quiet. If the main dining room is busy, head towards the dessert buffet room to find loads more hidden seats.
The nicest airport lounge I have ever experienced. Outstanding food offerings, outstanding service. Everything is new, clean and glamourous. Great job Qatar!
One of the most stunning lounges out there. Great champagne option and private nap rooms. Spa services incur an additional charge. Qatar First Class passengers only.

The Al-Safwa lounge is simply amazing. The space is huge, quiet, beautiful, and magnificently designed - not at all too "shiny". The a-la-carte restaurant is very good - and Krug is available as in Al-Mourjan. Very nice rooms are available for resting.

What a huge lounge! On Oct 25th 2015, there was more staff than guests. It's a huge space with lots of food and drink options. It's maybe a bit too big and not really cosy, but that's the only downside.
This is worldclass üò± Simply amazing, stunning and very posh! Wonderful service and HUGE! Well Done Qatar Airwaysüëçüèª Cant fly any less than First Class now ..
Al Safwa is BIG. Easy to get lost! Opened on 23 Oct. Bar (Krug at the ready), resto, showers, spa ($), family areas, duty free. Excellent, friendly service. No OW Emerald unless connecting to QR F.

location.terminalDirections: Ground Floor, Arrivals Level, After Baggage Reclaim
Ground Floor, Arrivals Level, Before Immigration
South Node Level 2. From the Teddy Bear Area, walk straight. Take the elevator or lift on the left. The lounge is located near Gates A, B and C.
Level M, Central Zone North Node. Walk or take the train to North Node, Concourse C. Located next to the Al Mourjan Orchard Business Class Lounge.
In the Duty Free South Area, take the escalators located to the northeast of the Giant Teddy Bear.

otherLounges.name: Qatar Airways Al Mourjan Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: From the Duty Free South Area, go up the escalators located to the left of the Giant Teddy Bear near Eye-Q Sunglasses and the Seafood Bar Caviar House & Prunier.

otherLounges.name: Qatar Airways Al Mourjan Business Class Lounge - North
Qatar Airways Al Mourjan Orchard Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Level M, Central Zone North Node. Walk or take the train to North Node, Concourse C. Access the lounge via escalators to the right, located before the Oryx Garden Hotel.

otherLounges.name: Qatar Airways First and Business Class Arrivals Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Ground Floor, Arrivals Level, after Baggage Reclaim.

otherLounges.name: Qatar Airways First and Business Class Arrivals Lounge (Before Immigration)

location.terminalDirections: Ground Floor, Arrivals Level, before Immigration.
Located in Concourse A, Level 1, Duty Free Plaza South.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge (South Node)

location.terminalDirections: Located in the luxury Duty Free area, near B Gates, 2 minutes walk from the iconic Teddy Bear sculpture, inside the corridor next to Loro Piana. The sleep 'n fly Sleep Lounge is centrally located in the heart of the transit area and in easy reach from passport control and all flight gates.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge & Showers (North Node)

location.terminalDirections: Located opposite Gates C30-31 on the lower level.
